arts.ttl: Benfica vs. Bayer Leverkusen: UEFA Champions League LIVE blog and team news
arts.sum: Bayer Leverkusen will hope to make it a case of fourth time's a charm when they face José Mourinho's Benfica in the UEFA Champions League on Wednesday (kick-off: 9pm CET). Former Hertha Berlin and Wolfsburg atttacker Dodi Lukébakio should feature from the get-go at the Estádio da Luz, while ex- Mainz midfielder Leandro Barreiro is expected to at least make the bench.
